definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: the tillable, untilled or fallow ground;—´[[נ]] abs. as acc. cogn. [[נִירוּ]] [[לָכֶם נִ֑יר]] Ho 10:12, Je 4:3 till you the untilled ground (fig. of unaccustomed moral action); cstr. only [[רָב־אׂכֶל נִיר רָאשִׁים]] Pr 13:23 abundant food (yields) the fallow ground of poor men (i.e. with ´[[י]]'s blessing).—I. [[נִיר]] v. [[נור]]. p. 632f
